snippet: Better known as Grimes, Ms. Boucher is far from the Nicki Minaj-Lady Gaga-Rihanna industrial pop music complex.
abstract: Claire Boucher, a Canadian synth-pop singer who performs under the names Grimes, describes her personal style and the musical influences in her new critically acclaimed album Visions.
lead_paragraph: Better known as Grimes, Ms. Boucher is far from the Nicki Minaj-Lady Gaga-Rihanna industrial pop music complex.

headline.seo: Claire Boucher, Known as Grimes, Mines Beauty From the Dark Side
headline.main: Claire Boucher Mines Beauty From the Dark Side
headline.print_headline: Unearthing Power And Beauty In the Dark Side
